body:
@precita can you blame the artist? PM Gals was such an intoxicating series to read, its plot was as good as a potatoe but it's hentai nonetheless - it's also worth noting that PM Gals works as a series because of established character interactions mixing itself with hentai - we have an idea of how the characters act and if the doujin can mimic the characters personality it feels like we're reading excluded parts of the story.

S&M doujins that include the main male protagonists are incredibly hard to follow if they aren't incredibly drawn - for male protagonists in pokemon don't have a compelling personality.
Way too short, but it seems like this artist was trying to mimic the Gambler Club PM Gals doujins.
